content.raw:
Could you please include a description about what is this pull request implementing?

The default compiler in Ubuntu Precise does not support C++11. If we require C++11 as a mandatory thing, gazebo won't compile in Ubuntu Precise. It is fine as soon as we deprecate the support on Precise, which as far as I know is not in the plans.
content.html:
Could you please include a description about what is this pull request implementing?

The default compiler in Ubuntu Precise does not support C++11. If we require C++11 as a mandatory thing, gazebo won't compile in Ubuntu Precise. It is fine as soon as we deprecate the support on Precise, which as far as I know is not in the plans.
